name: Who Stole My Pixels?
description:
Movement: WASD or arrow keys Jump: Space Shoot: Mouse1. Esc to remove the mouse lock!

Goal: survive as long as you can!

Theme of the jam was Duality - when you kill enemies you will lose pixels. Collect powerups to restore your pixels. Powerups - one gives HP, one restores pixels.

Enemies spawn in waves.

---

Made by a team of 5 for the Finnish Game Jam 2022

Team members:

https://turismomusic.itch.io/ - sound design, music, audio programming

https://nuutti.itch.io/ - Programming

https://irratium.itch.io/ - 3d art, level design, minor programming

https://siiri.itch.io/ - 2D and 3D art, FX

https://anssi57.itch.io/ - Programming
